author: danielf
msg: Prepare moving the virtual sitemap components to the whiteboard. They have not worked for a long time and IMHO the concept is flawed.

author: danielf
msg: Moving the contents of the module cocoon-common (exceptions with ProcessingException as a prominent member, Constants and the util.location package used by the ProcessingException) to the cocoon-pipeline-api module and updated the dependencies. After some of the recent refactoring the common module was only used in the pipeline and sitemap modules and there is not much reason to use it outside these, so there doesn't seem to be any point in having it as a separate module.
